summary: Completed comprehensive testing of newly added Mega-Sena and Lotofácil functionality to Brazilian lottery betting application. All backend APIs working perfectly. Frontend fully functional with all 4 lottery types integrated.
passed_tests: All 30 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Dashboard shows all 4 lotteries (Mega-Sena, Lotofácil, Quina, Dupla Sena)
Mega-Sena page loads and generates 6-number bets correctly
Lotofácil page loads and generates 15-number bets correctly
Statistics page shows tabs for all 4 lotteries
History page filter includes all 4 lotteries
Bet saving functionality for new lottery types
Real Caixa API integration working for new lotteries
Strategy selection working for new lottery types
